Desc.entry: Local ecumenical partnership involving the Anglican and Methodist churches. The centre is available for hire (see separate entry). Hosts different activities for the community.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Service at 10.30am, alternate Tues (lunch club), alternate Wed at 10am (midweek service), Sat from 10am onwards (coffee morning); other activities include Weightwatchers, dance class, Tai chi and monthly TownswomenÂ’s Guild meeting, please contact for details
